title: Attempting to reconnect 1...2...3 Log in error!
body:
I cant log in and haven't been able to all day is anyone else having this problem and is there any fast fixes to this situation

I know this isn't the place for this particular post but i feel ill get answers faster here

replies.body: it happens sometimes try restarting computer and router.
Tried this a bunch of times already. hasn't worked

>
> Tried this a bunch of times already. hasn't worked

ok have you tried repairing your game it could help also try google may have some info on how to fix
